titles.title: To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 3319 North Cicero Avenue in Chicago, Illinois, as the "Roman Pucinski Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

bill.summary: 10/10/2000--Introduced. Redesignates, as the Roman Pucinski Post Office, the U.S. Postal Service facility at 3319 N. Cicero Avenue in Chicago, Illinois, which is currently known as the Irving Park Post Office.
